name: RetroRange (Free Demo)
description:
This is the free demo for RetroRange. If you are looking for the full game it is located here,  https://aaron788.itch.io/retrorange 

RetroRange is a small-scope game with about a 5-minute experience, the idea was to create a sandbox shooting range, set up with a retro synthwave, cyberpunk theme. The two main features focused on in this game are shooting and objects that can be picked up moved and thrown. The range is equipped with various weapon pick-ups, ammo, and health packs. Also, it includes a few different targets to shoot with some destructible objects that can be picked up and moved. The idea of this project is to build a good FPS foundation with basic core features to be able to use in future projects.

If you are looking to learn more about RetroRange, the following listing below includes more in-depth details about the game. I will update this list as needed until the project is complete.

Developer & Producer: 788 Garage Studio

Game engine: Unity (Version 2020.3.3f1)

Features/Content implemented (As of 8/13/22):

  • Player controller (First person)  - Opsive U.C.C.
  • First Person Arms - Generic Animations
  • Weapon Pickups (Firearms) - pistol, AK, auto shotgun, pump shotgun, sniper rifle (All have aiming down sights. Sniper has aiming scope ability. All re-spawn.)
  • Ammo Pickups - for each firearm,  pistol, AK, auto shotgun, pump shotgun, sniper rifle (all re-spawn)
  • Health pack pickups (all re-spawn)
  • Intractable Objects that can be picked up and moved (Physics collides with appropriate colliders.)
  • Targets (With health system and re-spawning. Specific position hit with damage multiplier. One target with hinged physic.)
  • Stereo with on/off music
  • Tooney Colors 2 (Shader by Jean Moreno)

The following are Assets used in the project:

Playmaker (HuHutong Games), Shooting Range (Tirgames Assets), Animation Designer (Fimpossible Creations), U-Motion (Soxware Interactive), Low Poly Asset Bundle (JustCreate), Low Poly Weapons Vol. 1 (Simon Mercuzot), Sci-Fi Arsenal (Chiako3D[a.k.a CGi]), Cartoon FX 2 (Jean Moreno), Epic Toon FX (Archanor VFX), Ultimate Sound FX (Sidearm Studios), Ultimate Music Bundle (Sidearm Studios), Dark Fantasy Studio (Music), Gun & Explosion Sounds (Cafofo), Highlight Plus (Kronnect), UI Samples Unity Tech., Retro Aesthetics (Dustyroom), Impact - Physics Interaction System (Road Turtle Games), Synty Studio 3D Model Packs, Lean Localization (Carlos Wilkes)

Features/Content Planned (as of 8/13/22):

  • Adding more objects (about 20+ objects to pick up, move, and destroy)(Add sounds)
  • Melee weapon pickups - a few simple melee weapons to pick up and use
  • Free demo client (Updating as Full game changes)
  • Main menu, in-game menu - update UI elements to match the theme (Completed other than controls menu)
  • Credits listing - (Completed, Need to update as Patreon and Kickstarter support)
  • Options - Key binding Controller/Keyboard/Mouse with mouse sensitivity adjust (Rewired - Guavaman Enterprises)
  • Language Translation - Lean Localization (Carlos Wilkes)
